participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, with a love for storytelling and creativity.
participant_1.background: Sometimes I wish I didn’t have to wake up in the morning. I have trouble feeling emotion. I see a therapist that doesn’t really understand me. My parents are distant.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and curious, with a passion for communication and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: My dad is a journalist for the New York Times. I was born premature. I recently broke my leg. I have one older sister named Mary.

content.text: Hi, I'm (user 1's name).
Hi, I'm (user 2's name).
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to read, write, and play music.
Me too! I love to read, especially fantasy novels. I also like to write, but I'm not very good at it.
That's okay, I'm not very good at writing either. I just like to do it.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play guitar and piano. I'm not very good at either, but I have fun.
Me too! I like to play guitar, but I'm not very good at it either.
It's okay, we can practice together.
That sounds like fun!
What do you do for work?
I'm a student. I'm studying business at the University of California, Berkeley.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a student too. I'm studying journalism at the University of California, Los Angeles.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a journalist.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be challenging.
I can imagine. What's your favorite thing about being a journalist?
I love getting to meet new people and learn about new things.
That's a great answer. I think I'd like that too.
What's your favorite thing about being a student?
I love the freedom to learn what I want.
That's a great answer. I think that's one of the best things about being a student too.
Me too!
